name: Remember I
description:
spend five nights in twists bakery. Twist on the stage... but what nightmares are lurking in the back room? We can tell you. Look out for the old suits from Freddy’s  they have something inside... red Bonnie and Bobby The Bear on stage with twist. Welcome back. These animatronics aren’t the same as before...

Don’t look in the back room there’s something else hiding from the camera the only thing  you must do is keep it out....
